oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Sow and litter
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photograph of a sow and litter on the farm of Ewell Perry and family. The pigs are in a pen, with a trough and what appears to be corncobs.
The Home Food Supply Program was a war-relief program instituted by the administration of Gov. Prentice Cooper, Tennessee. Mr. Perry and family produced their annual supply of pork on the farm.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Tennessee Department of Conservation Photograph Collection, 1937-1976
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Cooper, Prentice, 1895-1969; Sows; Female livestock; Piglets; Agriculture; Corncobs
Farms; Swine; Animals; Livestock; War relief
